alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Mathews; Middlesex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 22 at 2:18AM EDT until June 22 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Gloucester, Middlesex and Mathews Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is possible in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. WARE RIVER AT SCHLEY VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.8 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/01 AM 4.3 1.6 2.2 1 NONE 22/01 PM 3.5 0.8 1.7 1 NONE 23/01 AM 3.6 0.9 1.5 1 NONE 23/01 PM 3.2 0.5 1.4 1 NONE 24/02 AM 3.3 0.6 1.3 1 NONE 24/03 PM 3.2 0.5 1.3 1 NONE YORKTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 2.4 FT, MAJOR 2.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/01 PM 3.5 0.9 1.4 1 NONE 23/01 AM 3.5 0.9 1.2 1 NONE 23/02 PM 3.1 0.5 1.0 1 NONE 24/02 AM 3.1 0.5 0.9 1 NONE 24/02 PM 3.0 0.4 0.9 1 NONE WINDMILL POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.1 FT, MAJOR 2.6 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 22/02 AM 3.0 1.6 1.6 1 MINOR 22/01 PM 2.4 1.0 1.4 1 NONE 23/02 AM 2.4 1.0 1.1 1 NONE 23/04 PM 2.3 0.9 1.2 1 NONE 24/03 AM 2.5 1.1 1.2 1 NONE 24/04 PM 2.4 1.0 1.2 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
